induction.title: Onboarding
induction.message: This section is for you to get to know us before you join your new position. You will find information about us and it will also allow you to carry out the administrative procedures for your incorporation.
induction.description_doc: These are all the documents related to your contract
induction.formats: PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG files only. Maximum file size of 5 MB.
induction.ready_text: Thank you very much for completing the tasks
induction.message_text: You will soon receive an email with your new login information so you can continue your process.
induction.select_subtitle: Select the type of onboarding you would like to send.

one.title: Onboarding a candidate
one.subtitle: Create your onboarding for a future collaborator.

massive.title: Mass onboarding
massive.subtitle: Create your onboarding for several collaborators at the same time.
